chefmod:AllYouCanEat.NAME: All-you-can-eat
chefmod:AllYouCanEat.DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Satiated for every Attack card in your hand.
chefmod:AllYouCanEat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Apply chefmod:Satiated for every Attack card in your hand.

chefmod:AlooGobi.NAME: Aloo Gobi
chefmod:AlooGobi.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you chefmod:Freeze this card, increase its Block by !M!.

chefmod:BananaSplit.NAME: Banana Split
chefmod:BananaSplit.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL chefmod:Hunger deals !M! more damage this combat.
chefmod:BananaSplit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL chefmod:Hunger deals !M! more damage this combat. Play a copy of this chefmod:Recipe.

chefmod:BaoBuns.NAME: Bao Buns
chefmod:BaoBuns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain !M! card this turn.

chefmod:BleedOut.NAME: Bleed Out
chefmod:BleedOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever the target takes unblocked attack damage, Weaken it. NL Exhaust
chefmod:BleedOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Deal !D! damage. Whenever the target takes unblocked attack damage, Weaken it. NL Exhaust

chefmod:Bruschetta.NAME: Bruschetta
chefmod:Bruschetta.DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Hunger. Retain a card this turn.

chefmod:CandyBowl.NAME: Candy Bowl
chefmod:CandyBowl.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Hunger deals !M! more damage this combat. NL Exhaust
chefmod:CandyBowl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Hunger deals !M! more damage this combat.

chefmod:CapreseSalad.NAME: Caprese Salad
chefmod:CapreseSalad.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When you shuffle, this card is always on top of the Draw Pile.

chefmod:CayenneCloud.NAME: Cayenne Cloud
chefmod:CayenneCloud.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

chefmod:Chop.NAME: Chop
chefmod:Chop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL If played while chefmod:Frozen, deal !D! damage twice.

chefmod:CleanHouse.NAME: Clean House
chefmod:CleanHouse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. chefmod:Freeze !M! Status or Curse cards.

chefmod:Cleavers.NAME: Cleavers
chefmod:Cleavers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL chefmod:Prepped: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.
chefmod:Cleavers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL chefmod:Prepped: Deal !D! damage to two random enemies.

chefmod:ColdSteel.NAME: Cold Steel
chefmod:ColdSteel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL When chefmod:Frozen, costs 1 less [E] this combat.

chefmod:CuttingBoard.NAME: Cutting Board
chefmod:CuttingBoard.DESCRIPTION: Retain a random card each turn.
chefmod:CuttingBoard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain a random card each turn, prioritizing cards with chefmod:Prepped effects.

chefmod:DeathByChocolate.NAME: Death by Chocolate
chefmod:DeathByChocolate.DESCRIPTION: If the target has both chefmod:Hunger and chefmod:Satiated, deal !M! damage. Otherwise, deal !D! damage.

chefmod:DeepFreeze.NAME: DeepFreeze
chefmod:DeepFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Move all your chefmod:Frozen cards to your discard pile. chefmod:Freeze your draw pile. NL Exhaust
chefmod:DeepFreeze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Move all your chefmod:Frozen cards to your discard pile. chefmod:Freeze your draw pile.

chefmod:Defrost.NAME: Defrost
chefmod:Defrost.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! chefmod:Frozen card to move to your hand.
chefmod:Defrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! chefmod:Frozen cards to move to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: to move from your Frozen pile to your hand.

chefmod:DimSum.NAME: Dim Sum
chefmod:DimSum.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Apply chefmod:Hunger. NL chefmod:Prepped: Shuffle this into your draw pile.
chefmod:DimSum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Startup: chefmod:Hunger deals !M! more damage. NL Apply chefmod:Hunger.

chefmod:DinoKale.NAME: Dino Kale
chefmod:DinoKale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL chefmod:Prepped: Gain !B! Block next turn.

chefmod:DoubleChop.NAME: Double Chop
chefmod:DoubleChop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL chefmod:Freeze this card if it's in your hand at the end of turn.

chefmod:Escargot.NAME: Escargots
chefmod:Escargot.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL Upgrade ALL your chefmod:Frozen cards.
chefmod:Escargot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL Upgrade ALL your cards.

chefmod:FarmersMarket.NAME: Farmer's Market
chefmod:FarmersMarket.DESCRIPTION: Fetch an chefmod:Ingredient from your Draw pile. NL Exhaust
chefmod:FarmersMarket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! chefmod:Ingredients from your Draw pile. They cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust

chefmod:Fillet.NAME: Fillet
chefmod:Fillet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Make a copy of this card and chefmod:Freeze it.

chefmod:FiveAlarmChili.NAME: 5-Alarm Chili
chefmod:FiveAlarmChili.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 3 chefmod:Ingredients NL Choose a skill. It deals !M! damage to ALL enemies whenever you use it.

chefmod:Flambe.NAME: Flambé
chefmod:Flambe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL chefmod:Prepped: Shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust

chefmod:FreezerBurn.NAME: Freezer Burn
chefmod:FreezerBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for every chefmod:Frozen card.
chefmod:FreezerBurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for every card chefmod:Frozen this combat.

chefmod:FreezeSolid.NAME: Freeze Solid
chefmod:FreezeSolid.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you chefmod:Freeze a card, gain !M! Block.

chefmod:FreshProduce.NAME: Fresh Produce
chefmod:FreshProduce.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an chefmod:Ingredient, draw a card.
chefmod:FreshProduce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an chefmod:Ingredient, draw !M! cards.

chefmod:FrozenTuna.NAME: Frozen Tuna
chefmod:FrozenTuna.DESCRIPTION: Startup: chefmod:Freeze this card. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
chefmod:FrozenTuna.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Startup: chefmod:Freeze this card. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Whenever this card is chefmod:Frozen, increase its damage by !M!.

chefmod:FullBurn.NAME: Full Burn
chefmod:FullBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL chefmod:Prepped: gain [E] .
chefmod:FullBurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL chefmod:Prepped: gain [E] [E] .

chefmod:FullCourseMeal.NAME: Full-Course Meal
chefmod:FullCourseMeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Gain !M! Block, and !M! Block next turn.

chefmod:Gelato.NAME: Gelato
chefmod:Gelato.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Freeze !M! Skills. NL Gain Block equal to !B! times their total cost.

chefmod:HotSoup.NAME: Hot Soup
chefmod:HotSoup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. At the end of turn, chefmod:Freeze this if it's in your hand.

chefmod:IceCreamCone.NAME: Ice Cream Cone
chefmod:IceCreamCone.DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Satiated and chefmod:Supercooled. Play your oldest chefmod:Frozen attack.
chefmod:IceCreamCone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Satiated and chefmod:Supercooled. Play your !M! oldest chefmod:Frozen attacks.

chefmod:Julienne.NAME: Julienne
chefmod:Julienne.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL chefmod:Freeze the next card you use.

chefmod:Leftovers.NAME: Leftovers
chefmod:Leftovers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you chefmod:Freeze this card, double its damage.

chefmod:LocoMoco.NAME: Loco Moco
chefmod:LocoMoco.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL Apply chefmod:Satiated to ALL enemies. Draw !M! cards.
chefmod:LocoMoco.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL Apply chefmod:Satiated to ALL enemies. Draw !M! cards. Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this combat.

chefmod:Mince.NAME: Mince
chefmod:Mince.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, draw a skill. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

chefmod:MonsterBait.NAME: Monster Bait
chefmod:MonsterBait.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target has chefmod:Hunger, increase the damage by !M!.

chefmod:NewMenu.NAME: New Menu
chefmod:NewMenu.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. If no attacks are drawn, apply chefmod:Hunger to ALL enemies.
chefmod:NewMenu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. For each non-attack drawn, apply chefmod:Hunger to ALL enemies.

chefmod:NoSoupForYou.NAME: No Soup For You
chefmod:NoSoupForYou.DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Hunger. chefmod:Freeze an attack that costs 2 or more [E] .
chefmod:NoSoupForYou.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Hunger. chefmod:Freeze an attack that costs 2 or more [E] and play your oldest chefmod:Frozen card.

chefmod:OldCookbook.NAME: Old Cookbook
chefmod:OldCookbook.DESCRIPTION: Add a random chefmod:Recipe to your hand. NL Exhaust
chefmod:OldCookbook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random chefmod:Recipe to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust

chefmod:Omelette.NAME: Omelette
chefmod:Omelette.DESCRIPTION: Choose an attack. It deals !M! more damage. NL Exhaust
chefmod:Omelette.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an attack. It deals !M! more damage. Whenever you play it, shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust

chefmod:OrderUp.NAME: Order Up
chefmod:OrderUp.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, play your oldest chefmod:Frozen card and chefmod:Freeze 1

chefmod:PotatoGratin.NAME: Potato Gratin
chefmod:PotatoGratin.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply chefmod:Satiated to ALL enemies.

chefmod:PrepCook.NAME: Prep Cook
chefmod:PrepCook.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Retain a card, increase its Block and/or damage by !M! the next time you use it.
chefmod:PrepCook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Retain a card, increase its Block and/or damage by !M! this combat.

chefmod:Puree.NAME: Purée
chefmod:Puree.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL chefmod:Prepped: chefmod:Freeze this card.

chefmod:QuickChop.NAME: Quick Chop
chefmod:QuickChop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play the oldest chefmod:Frozen card.
chefmod:QuickChop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play the !M! oldest chefmod:Frozen cards.

chefmod:QuickThaw.NAME: Quick Thaw
chefmod:QuickThaw.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:No-Freeze NL Play the oldest chefmod:Frozen card. chefmod:Freeze 1.
chefmod:QuickThaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:No-Freeze NL Play the !M! oldest chefmod:Frozen cards. chefmod:Freeze !M!.

chefmod:RaidPantry.NAME: Raid Pantry
chefmod:RaidPantry.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:No-Freeze NL Play all your chefmod:Frozen Attacks.

chefmod:Ratatouille.NAME: Ratatouille
chefmod:Ratatouille.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL chefmod:Prepped: Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

chefmod:RisingDough.NAME: Rising Dough
chefmod:RisingDough.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Choose a card to put on top of the draw pile. NL Exhaust
chefmod:RisingDough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Choose a card to put on top of the draw pile.

chefmod:SaveForLater.NAME: Save for Later
chefmod:SaveForLater.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Exhaust it and shuffle !M! copies into your draw pile.

chefmod:SearedScallops.NAME: Seared Scallops
chefmod:SearedScallops.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Inflict chefmod:Hunger on ALL enemies. Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

chefmod:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice & Dice
chefmod:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL chefmod:Prepped: Deal !D! damage again.

chefmod:Sorbet.NAME: Sorbet
chefmod:Sorbet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play your oldest chefmod:Frozen power. NL Apply chefmod:Hunger. NL chefmod:Freeze !M! power.

chefmod:SpaghettiCarbonara.NAME: Spaghetti Carbonara
chefmod:SpaghettiCarbonara.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:No-Freeze NL Play the X oldest chefmod:Frozen cards.
chefmod:SpaghettiCarbonara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:No-Freeze NL Draw the X oldest chefmod:Frozen cards. They cost 0 until played.

chefmod:SushiPlatter.NAME: Sushi Platter
chefmod:SushiPlatter.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: !M! chefmod:Ingredients NL Your attacks deal double damage this turn.
chefmod:SushiPlatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: chefmod:Recipe: !M! chefmod:Ingredients NL Your attacks deal double damage this turn and next turn.

chefmod:TastyDistraction.NAME: Tasty Distraction
chefmod:TastyDistraction.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you would take unblocked attack damage, instead play your oldest chefmod:Frozen card and Exhaust it.

chefmod:Tenderizer.NAME: Tenderizer
chefmod:Tenderizer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL chefmod:Prepped: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

chefmod:TodaysSpecial.NAME: Today's Special
chefmod:TodaysSpecial.DESCRIPTION: Apply chefmod:Hunger. NL The first time you draw this, choose a chefmod:Recipe to cook.

chefmod:TonkotsuRamen.NAME: Tonkotsu Ramen
chefmod:TonkotsuRamen.DESCRIPTION: chefmod:No-Freeze NL Play your oldest chefmod:Frozen card and put it on top of your draw pile.

chefmod:TwoForOne.NAME: 2-For-1 Coupon
chefmod:TwoForOne.DESCRIPTION: Your currently chefmod:Frozen cards are played twice the next time you use them. NL Exhaust
chefmod:TwoForOne.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your currently chefmod:Frozen cards are played twice this combat. NL Exhaust

chefmod:VegetableTart.NAME: Vegetable Tart
chefmod:VegetableTart.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each chefmod:Frozen card. Gain !B! Block.

chefmod:NeowNuggets.NAME: Neow Nuggets
chefmod:NeowNuggets.DESCRIPTION: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL Your starter Strike and Defend cards are Upgraded and Exhaust. NL Add a *Nugget *Strike to your chefmod:Frozen pile.

chefmod:SpireCrepes.NAME: Spire Crêpes
chefmod:SpireCrepes.DESCRIPTION: 2 chefmod:Ingredients NL For the rest of this combat, *Today's *Special is played twice when used.

chefmod:FriedLagavulin.NAME: Fried Lagavulin
chefmod:FriedLagavulin.DESCRIPTION: 3 chefmod:Ingredients NL You may only play 1 Attack each turn. It deals double damage.

chefmod:NobStew.NAME: Nob Stew
chefmod:NobStew.DESCRIPTION: 3 chefmod:Ingredients NL Every Skill you play gives a random Attack in your hand +2 damage.

chefmod:SentryBrittle.NAME: Sentry Brittle
chefmod:SentryBrittle.DESCRIPTION: 3 chefmod:Ingredients NL When you draw a Status, Exhaust it and deal 3 damage to all enemies.

chefmod:StabKabob.NAME: Stab Kabob
chefmod:StabKabob.DESCRIPTION: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Each turn, put an attack from your draw pile into your hand.

chefmod:SlaverSalad.NAME: Slaver Salad
chefmod:SlaverSalad.DESCRIPTION: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Add a *Bandage *Up, a *Blind, and a *Trip to your hand.

chefmod:GremlinGoulash.NAME: Gremlin Goulash
chefmod:GremlinGoulash.DESCRIPTION: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Choose a card in your hand. It gets played twice this combat.

chefmod:NemesisSouffle.NAME: Nemesis Soufflé
chefmod:NemesisSouffle.DESCRIPTION: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Gain 1 Intangible. Apply chefmod:Satiated to a random enemy.

chefmod:GiantMarbleCake.NAME: Giant Marble Cake
chefmod:GiantMarbleCake.DESCRIPTION: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Draw 2 cards. ALL attacks in your hand deal 5 more damage this combat.

chefmod:ReptoRavioli.NAME: Repto-Ravioli
chefmod:ReptoRavioli.DESCRIPTION: 4 chefmod:Ingredients NL Add a *Repto *Dagger to your hand.

chefmod:ReptoDagger.NAME: Repto Dagger
chefmod:ReptoDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Shuffle this card into your draw pile. It deals damage an additional time when next used.
